game.title: The Game
game.synopsis: The game is about a cat named Fluffy who is trying to find his owner. He is on a journey to find his owner and goes on an adventure to find him.
game.beginning: Fluffy wakes up and realizes he's lost. In a strange place, he wonders if he's dreaming or really lost.
game.ending: Fluffy finally reunites with his owner, both overjoyed, and Fluffy finds his home.
description: Fluffy embarks on an exciting quest to find his owner. Along the way, he encounters challenges and learns about friendship and resilience.
Fluffy's adventure is filled with discovery and growth as he explores the world around him.
